events.message: I reported a car accident that happened last night involving my vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under auto accident due to the collision details provided.
An agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will guide you through the process.
Your claim concerning the vehicle collision has been officially acknowledged by our system.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged car, and your vehicle registration to proceed.
I have provided all requested documents, including photos and the police report related to the accident.
The investigation team has started reviewing the submitted evidence and circumstances of the car collision.
Investigation has been completed confirming the other driver was at fault based on provided evidence.
A settlement offer covering repair costs for your vehicle and rental car expenses has been proposed.
I am satisfied with the proposed settlement and appreciate the quick and clear communication.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and the settlement terms have been finalized.
The payment to cover your vehicle repairs and rental car fees has been issued and should reflect shortly.
Your auto accident claim case has been officially closed following payment and confirmation of repairs.
All documents and records related to your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
